As, \( \left\{v_{1}, v_{2} \cdots v_{k}\right\} \) are leneirly independent, we must have \( b_{1}-b_{2}-b_{3}-\ldots-b_{k}=0 \quad \& \quad b_{2}=b_{3}=\cdots b_{k}=0 \) Hence, \( \left\{v_{1}, v_{2}-v_{1}, v_{3}-v_{1}, \cdots \cdot v_{k}-v_{1}\right\} \) are linearly indefandent.
